name: Will Mayhew
title: Junior Software Developer
bio: A Computer Science graduate with a First Class Honours degree from the University of Southampton. I'm a junior developer at Dorset Software working on large-scale microservice architectures for enterprise clients. I'm passionate about full-stack development with experience across C#, Angular, and SQL. I thrive in Agile Scrum environments and am committed to writing quality code through rigorous testing and code review practices.
